text: Hustle is a 1975 American crime movie. It was directed by Robert Aldrich. Actors include Burt Reynolds, Catherine Deneuve, Paul Winfield, Eddie Albert, Ernest Borgnine, Eileen Brennan, and Ben Johnson. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1975 crime movies Category:1975 mystery movies Category:1970s American crime movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Aldrich Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Hustle (1975 movie)
